1.title: From Stage to Screen

episode of.title: Bring Me Morecambe and Wise (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: The first episode uncovers an early incarnation of one of their most classic sketches, which even their nearest and dearest didn't know existed. It also recalls the moment that the nation discovered news reader Angela Rippon had legs, and celebrates Eric's love of props, from a ventriloquist dummy to the infamous curtain. Bring Me Morecambe And Wise also explains how the comedy legends were brought together by Eric's mum in 1939, after the two teenage comics met during auditions for Jack Hylton for a variety tour. The series follows their career performing together ...

2.title: The Guest Stars

episode of.title: Bring Me Morecambe and Wise (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: This second part looks at some of the duo's most memorable guests.

3.title: At Home with Eric & Ern

episode of.title: Bring Me Morecambe and Wise (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: GOLD's five-part tribute to the comedy duo here focuses on their home-based sketches, and explains how they came to share a bed.

4.title: The Plays Wot Ernie Wrote

episode of.title: Bring Me Morecambe and Wise (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: GOLD's tribute to the beloved double act here recalls their big-screen outings, their thespian guests, and Ernie's 'great' plays.

5.title: Christmas

episode of.title: Bring Me Morecambe and Wise (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: GOLD's five-part tribute concludes with a celebration of the comedy duo's Christmas specials, and charts how they became a nationwide tradition.
